title: 620: STRIKE TO OFFER ‘NO FEE’ BITCOIN BUYING AND TRADING!! BTC ON TARGET TO HIT $250K, SAYS TOP ANALYST!!
description:
Payments platform Strike has announced that it will allow U.S. customers to buy & sell Bitcoin with almost no trading fees from today.

In an announcement on July 1, Strike founder and CEO Jack Mallers launched a salvo at leading U.S. crypto exchange Coinbase, stating that his platform will set out to be the “cheapest and easiest place on the planet to acquire BTC."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
